results.title: Like blood
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maya Haviland and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘Petul is my older sister’s godfather and I am the first woman from my family to visit his grave.’ Maya Haviland’s return to Mexico after eight years made her realise the sense of distance between family members.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Maya Haviland and ACMI

results.title: Bill's story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Lorraine Ermacora and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Lorraine Ermacora and ACMI
results.description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.

results.title: Illustrating absence
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Rebecca Carland and ACMI
results.brief_description: As a researcher it was natural for Rebecca Carland to be curious and begin the unravelling. She tells of her obsession with illustrator Arthur Bartholomew, a relationship that has continued in his absence and long after the project concluded.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Rebecca Carland and ACMI

results.title: The Luddite's tale
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Myfanwy Thompson and ACMI
results.brief_description: Myfawny Thompson is perplexed by technology, especially the need to text to communicate. After helping her mother move house, Thomspon starts to realise what a wonderful gift technology can be.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Myfanwy Thompson and ACMI

results.title: Uncovering bones
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Helen Kakakios and ACMI
results.brief_description: Helen Kakakios started a journey thinking she would do one thing but opened up all sorts of other possibilities and experiences. A story of identity, family and both the joy and pain of a journey home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Helen Kakakios and ACMI
results.description: Helen Kakakios started a journey thinking she would do one thing but opened up all sorts of other possibilities and experiences. A story of identity, family and both the joy and pain of a journey home.

results.title: The Will to live
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Val Colbert and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fragile at birth and not meant to live, Val Colbert’s mother went the extra step to keep her alive. This story is dedicated to Colbert’s mum’s tenacity and eternal strength.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Val Colbert and ACMI
results.description: Fragile at birth and not meant to live, Val Colbert’s mother went the extra step to keep her alive. This story is dedicated to Colbert’s mum’s tenacity and eternal strength.

results.title: Frocks on the docks
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Liz Orr and ACMI
results.brief_description: Liz Orr talks about the dress she bought between curtain calls, the fundraiser for Heather Osland’s defence and the fight to keep the union strong on Melbourne’s docks.

results.title: In search of adventure
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Kirsty McGeoch and ACMI
results.brief_description: After five years of study, Kirsty McGeoch had a law degree and a lifetime of career achievements ahead. Something, however, was telling her not to do it and to follow another path. Ultimately, this story is about honouring what fulfils the spirit.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Kirsty McGeoch and ACMI

results.title: Behind the scenes
results.creator_credit: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Adventures in the Strait
results.creator_credit: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The rope that linked the dinghy to the boat had snapped. It was up to me to fix it. Sorogo’s story about an experience that showed him what he was really made of.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
